movie.title: The Captain from Kopenick
movie.plot: The 1956 movie based on the theater play by Carl Zuckmayer based on the true story of cobbler Wilhelm Voigt who dressed up as a German military officer and, with the help of unsuspecting soldiers, took over the city hall in Köpenick and confiscated the city's purse.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 3 nominations.
